src/ts/components/SSE.tsx.description:
The SSE component makes it possible to collect data from e.g. a ResponseStream. It's a wrapper around the SSE.js library.
https://github.com/mpetazzoni/sse.js

id.description: Unique ID to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

options.description: Options passed to the SSE constructor.

payload.description: - payload as a Blob, ArrayBuffer, Dataview, FormData, URLSearchParams, or string
payload.name: union
payload.raw: string | Blob | ArrayBuffer | DataView | FormData | URLSearchParams

start.description: - flag, if streaming should start automatically
start.name: bool

concat.description: A boolean indicating if the stream values should be concatenated.

value.description: The data value. Either the latest, or the concatenated depending on the `concat` property.

done.description: A boolean indicating if the (current) stream has ended.

update_component.description: A boolean indicating if the strea, should update components.
